verses.verse: Now <WG1161> there were <WG2258> <WG5713> in <WG2596> the Congregation <WG1577> that was <WG5607> <WG5752> at <WG1722> Antioch <WG490> certain <WG5100> prophets <WG4396> and <WG2532> teachers <WG1320>; as <WG5037> Bar-Nabba <WG921>, and <WG2532> SHim`on <WG4826> that was called <WG2564> <WG5746> Niger <WG3526>, and <WG2532> Lucius <WG3066> of Cyrene <WG2956>, and <WG5037> Manaen <WG3127>, which had been brought up <WG4939> with Herod <WG2264> the tetrarch <WG5076>, and <WG2532> Saul <WG4569>.

As <WG1161> they <WG846> ministered <WG3008> <WG5723> to the YY <WG2962>, and <WG2532> fasted <WG3522> <WG5723>, the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> said <WG2036> <WG5627>, <WG1211> Separate <WG873> <WG5657> me <WG3427> <WG5037> Bar-Nabba <WG921> and <WG2532> Saul <WG4569> for <WG1519> the work <WG2041> whereunto <WG3739> I have called <WG4341> <WG5766> them <WG846>.

And <WG5119> when they had fasted <WG3522> <WG5660> and <WG2532> prayed <WG4336> <WG5666>, and <WG2532> laid <WG2007> their hands <WG5495> on <WG2007> <WG5631> them <WG846>, they sent them away <WG630> <WG5656>.

So <WG3303> <WG3767> they <WG3778>, being sent forth <WG1599> <WG5685> by <WG5259> the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>, departed <WG2718> <WG5627> unto <WG1519> Seleucia <WG4581>; and from <WG1564> thence <WG5037> they sailed <WG636> <WG5656> to <WG1519> Cyprus <WG2954>.

And <WG2532> when they were <WG1096> <WG5637> at <WG1722> Salamis <WG4529>, they preached <WG2605> <WG5707> the word <WG3056> of 'Elohim <WG2316> in <WG1722> the synagogues <WG4864> of the Jews <WG2453>: and <WG1161> they had <WG2192> <WG5707> also <WG2532> Yochanan <WG2491> to their minister <WG5257>.

And <WG1161> when they had gone through <WG1330> <WG5631> the isle <WG3520> unto <WG891> Paphos <WG3974>, they found <WG2147> <WG5627> a certain <WG5100> sorcerer <WG3097>, a false prophet <WG5578>, a Jew <WG2453>, whose <WG3739> name <WG3686> was BarYeshuw`a <WG919>:

Which <WG3739> was <WG2258> <WG5713> with <WG4862> the deputy of the country <WG446>, Sergius <WG4588> SHa'ulus <WG3972>, a prudent <WG4908> man <WG435>; who <WG3778> called <WG4341> <WG5666> for Bar-Nabba <WG921> and <WG2532> Saul <WG4569>, and desired <WG1934> <WG5656> to hear <WG191> <WG5658> the word <WG3056> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

But <WG1161> Elymas <WG1681> the sorcerer <WG3097> (for <WG1063> so <WG3779> is his <WG846> name <WG3686> by interpretation <WG3177> <WG5743>) withstood <WG436> <WG5710> them <WG846>, seeking <WG2212> <WG5723> to turn away <WG1294> <WG5658> the deputy <WG446> from <WG575> the faith <WG4102>.

Then <WG1161> Saul <WG4569>, (who <WG3588> also <WG2532> is called SHa'ul <WG3972>,) filled with <WG4130> <WG5685> the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>, <WG2532> set his eyes <WG816> <WG5660> on <WG1519> him <WG846>,

And said <WG2036> <WG5627>, O <WG5599> full <WG4134> of all <WG3956> subtilty <WG1388> and <WG2532> all <WG3956> mischief <WG4468>, thou child <WG5207> of the devil <WG1228>, thou enemy <WG2190> of all <WG3956> righteousness <WG1343>, wilt thou <WG3973> not <WG3756> cease <WG3973> <WG5695> to pervert <WG1294> <WG5723> the right <WG2117> ways <WG3598> of the YY <WG2962>?

And <WG2532> now <WG3568>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, the hand <WG5495> of the YY <WG2962> is upon <WG1909> thee <WG4571>, and <WG2532> thou shalt be <WG2071> <WG5704> blind <WG5185>, not <WG3361> seeing <WG991> <WG5723> the sun <WG2246> for <WG891> a season <WG2540>. And <WG1161> immediately <WG3916> there fell <WG1968> <WG5627> on <WG1909> him <WG846> a mist <WG887> and <WG2532> a darkness <WG4655>; and <WG2532> he went about <WG4013> <WG5723> seeking <WG2212> <WG5707> some to lead him by the hand <WG5497>.

Then <WG5119> the deputy <WG446>, when he saw <WG1492> <WG5631> what was done <WG1096> <WG5756>, believed <WG4100> <WG5656>, being astonished <WG1605> <WG5746> at <WG1909> the doctrine <WG1322> of the YY <WG2962>.

Now <WG1161> when SHa'ul <WG3972> and his company <WG4012> loosed <WG321> <WG5685> from <WG575> Paphos <WG3974>, they came <WG2064> <WG5627> to <WG1519> Perga <WG4011> in Pamphylia <WG3828>: and <WG1161> Yochanan <WG2491> departing <WG672> <WG5660> from <WG575> them <WG846> returned <WG5290> <WG5656> to <WG1519> Yerushalayim <WG2414>.

But <WG1161> when they <WG846> departed <WG1330> <WG5631> from <WG575> Perga <WG4011>, they came <WG3854> <WG5633> to <WG1519> Antioch <WG490> in Pisidia <WG4099>, and <WG2532> went <WG1525> <WG5631> into <WG1519> the synagogue <WG4864> on the sabbath <WG4521> day <WG2250>, and sat down <WG2523> <WG5656>.

And <WG1161> after <WG3326> the reading <WG320> of the Torah <WG3551> and <WG2532> the prophets <WG4396> the rulers of the synagogue <WG752> sent <WG649> <WG5656> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Ye men <WG435> and brethren <WG80>, if <WG1487> ye have <WG2076> <WG5748> <WG1722> <WG5213> any word <WG3056> of exhortation <WG3874> for <WG4314> the people <WG2992>, say on <WG3004> <WG5720>.

Then <WG1161> SHa'ul <WG3972> stood up <WG450> <WG5631>, and <WG2532> beckoning <WG2678> <WG5660> with his hand <WG5495> said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Men <WG435> of Yisra'EL <WG2475>, and <WG2532> ye that fear <WG5399> <WG5740> 'Elohim <WG2316>, give audience <WG191> <WG5657>.

The 'Elohim <WG2316> of this <WG5127> people <WG2992> of Yisra'EL <WG2474> chose <WG1586> <WG5668> our <WG2257> fathers <WG3962>, and <WG2532> exalted <WG5312> <WG5656> the people <WG2992> when <WG1722> they dwelt as strangers <WG3940> in <WG1722> the land <WG1093> of Egypt <WG125>, and <WG2532> with <WG3326> an high <WG5308> arm <WG1023> brought he <WG1806> <WG5627> them <WG846> out of <WG1537> it <WG846>.
And <WG2532> about <WG5613> the time <WG5550> of forty years <WG5063> suffered he <WG5159> their <WG846> manners <WG5159> <WG5656> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2048>.

And <WG2532> when he had destroyed <WG2507> <WG5631> seven <WG2033> nations <WG1484> in <WG1722> the land <WG1093> of Chanaan <WG5477>, he divided <WG2624> their <WG846> land <WG1093> to them <WG846> by lot <WG2624> <WG5656>.

And <WG2532> after <WG3326> that <WG5023> he gave <WG1325> <WG5656> unto them judges <WG2923> about <WG5613> the space of four hundred <WG5071> and <WG2532> fifty <WG4004> years <WG2094>, until <WG2193> SH'mu'el <WG4545> the prophet <WG4396>.

And afterward <WG2547> they desired <WG154> <WG5668> a king <WG935>: and <WG2532> 'Elohim <WG2316> gave <WG1325> <WG5656> unto them <WG846> Saul <WG4549> the son <WG5207> of Cis <WG2797>, a man <WG435> of <WG1537> the tribe <WG5443> of Binyamin <WG958>, by the space of forty <WG5062> years <WG2094>.

And <WG2532> when he had removed <WG3179> <WG5660> him <WG846>, he raised up <WG1453> <WG5656> unto them <WG846> David <WG1138> to be <WG1519> their king <WG935>; to whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> he gave testimony <WG3140> <WG5660>, and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, I have found <WG2147> <WG5627> David <WG1138> the son of Yishai <WG2421>, a man <WG435> after <WG2596> mine own <WG3450> heart <WG2588>, which <WG3739> shall fulfil <WG4160> <WG5692> all <WG3956> my <WG3450> will <WG2307>.

Of <WG575> this man's <WG5127> seed <WG4690> hath <WG1453> 'Elohim <WG2316> according <WG2596> to his promise <WG1860> raised <WG1453> <WG5656> unto Yisra'EL <WG2474> a Saviour <WG4990>, Yeshuw`a <WG2424>:

When Yochanan <WG2491> had first preached <WG4296> <WG5660> before <WG4253> his <WG846> coming <WG4383> <WG1529> the immersion <WG908> of repentance <WG3341> to all <WG3956> the people <WG2992> of Yisra'EL <WG2474>.

Men <WG435> and brethren <WG80>, children <WG5207> of the stock <WG1085> of Avraham <WG11>, and <WG2532> whosoever among <WG1722> you <WG5213> feareth <WG5399> <WG5740> 'Elohim <WG2316>, to you <WG5213> is <WG649> the word <WG3056> of this <WG5026> salvation <WG4991> sent <WG649> <WG5648>.

And <WG2532> though they found <WG2147> <WG5631> no <WG3367> cause <WG156> of death <WG2288> in him, yet desired they <WG154> <WG5668> Pilate <WG4091> that he <WG846> should be slain <WG337> <WG5683>.

But <WG1161> 'Elohim <WG2316> raised <WG1453> <WG5656> him <WG846> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>:

And <WG2532> we <WG2249> declare <WG2097> unto you <WG5209> glad tidings <WG2097> <WG5731>, how that <WG3754> the promise <WG1860> which was made <WG1096> <WG5637> unto <WG4314> the fathers <WG3962>,

For <WG1063> <WG3303> David <WG1138>, after he had served <WG5256> <WG5660> his own <WG2398> generation <WG1074> by the will <WG1012> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, fell on sleep <WG2837> <WG5681>, and <WG2532> was laid <WG4369> <WG5681> unto <WG4314> his <WG846> fathers <WG3962>, and <WG2532> saw <WG1492> <WG5627> corruption <WG1312>:
But <WG1161> he, whom <WG3739> 'Elohim <WG2316> raised again <WG1453> <WG5656>, saw <WG1492> <WG5627> no <WG3756> corruption <WG1312>.

Be it <WG2077> <WG5749> known <WG1110> unto you <WG5213> therefore <WG3767>, men <WG435> and brethren <WG80>, that <WG3754> through <WG1223> this man <WG5127> is preached <WG2605> <WG5743> unto you <WG5213> the forgiveness <WG859> of sins <WG266>:

Beware <WG991> <WG5720> therefore <WG3767>, lest that <WG3361> come <WG1904> <WG5632> upon <WG1909> you <WG5209>, which is spoken of <WG2046> <WG5772> in <WG1722> the prophets <WG4396>;

For <WG1063> so <WG3779> hath <WG1781> the YY <WG2962> commanded <WG1781> <WG5769> us <WG2254>, saying, I have set <WG5087> <WG5758> thee <WG4571> to be <WG1519> a light <WG5457> of the goyim <WG1484>, that thou <WG4571> shouldest be <WG1511> <WG5750> for <WG1519> salvation <WG4991> unto <WG2193> the ends <WG2078> of the earth <WG1093>.

And <WG1161> the word <WG3056> of the YY <WG2962> was published <WG1308> <WG5712> throughout <WG1223> all <WG3650> the region <WG5561>.

And <WG1161> the Talmidim <WG3101> were filled with <WG4137> <WG5712> joy <WG5479>, and <WG2532> with the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>.
